complaint.description: My Network is always slow but quick to make a debit from my account. They hire people from India to give us service in South Africa. How do you expect someone from India to assist you while you're in RSA? Communication level is poor, they always telling you one thing as if they are robots and some are failing to give reference for our calls.
complaint.suggestion: Improve network speed, hire local customer service representatives, improve communication and provide reference numbers for calls.
